meanings.sent1: The overdyers in the class always had the most colorful clothes.
meanings.sent2: The overdyers at the textile factory were known for their vibrant creations.
meanings.sent3: The overdyers accidentally turned their white shirts into rainbows.
meanings.sent4: The overdyers painted the fabric with every color of the rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The overdyers' hands were always stained with various dyes.

meanings.definition: The act of dyeing fabric excessively.
meanings.sent1: Excessive overdyers can damage the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The overdyers resulted in a beautiful mess of colors.
meanings.sent3: The overdyers turned the plain cloth into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The overdyers transformed the fabric into a kaleidoscope.
meanings.sent5: The overdyers' passion for dyeing knew no bounds.
